newsitem.title: DENMARK: FORECAST-Danish shares seen 6.7 pct up by Oct 1997.
newsitem.headline: FORECAST-Danish shares seen 6.7 pct up by Oct 1997.

text.p: Leading Danish share prices are expected to rise by an average 6.7 percent by end-Sept 1997, according to a Reuter poll of analysts' forecasts issued on Tuesday.
Eight analysts saw the Copenhagen bourse's top-20 KFX index rising to between 120 and 140 at the end of September next year, an average of 133 -- compared to Monday's record high closing of 125.35.
They forecast an almost unchanged average of 126 by end-December 1996 rising to 129 by end-March 1997, as economic growth improves.
Industry, building and construction sector paper were poised for the most palpaple gains, while shipping and medicinal shares were seen by the panel as doing less well in the 12-month period.
